Question: Rice Ear Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Rice Ear Ltd.

Product: CES 2024

- Unity headphones with full lossless audio support up to 24-bit/96kHz from networked devices and streaming services over Wi-Fi, storage for a small hi-res music library, Bluetooth connectivity, and dual-core processor, memory, storage, and a 9-axis IMU for accurate head-tracking motion detection for codec agnostic decoding of spatial and immersive audio in real-time.

- Master & Dynamic MW75-Neuro headphones with EEG-enabled wearables, sensors integrated into the fabric parts of the frame for tracking brainwaves, and Neurable AI app for iOS or Android.

- Sennheiser Momentum True Wireless 4 earbuds with aptX Lossless Audio, Auracast support, Qualcomm S5 Sound Gen 2 platform, Snapdragon Sound Technology, Bluetooth 5.4 connectivity with ultra-low latency, and Auracast for wireless streaming to an unlimited number of nearby audio devices.

- JBL Live TWS 3 Series earbuds with a smart charging case, Bluetooth 5.3 with LE, and IP55-rating against water and dust.

- Shokz OpenSwim Pro bone-conduction headphones with Bluetooth and MP3 compatibility, 32GB storage capacity, PremiumPitch 2.0+ technology, three EQ modes, two microphones, echo cancellation, and IP68 rating, allowing use submerged in water for up to two hours.

Note: The specifications and features of the products are based on the raw content provided.
